title: CRUD & Searching & Sorting Tasks
description: Manage your tasks with full CRUD capabilities and advanced searching and sorting features.

title: Recycle Bin
description: Restore deleted tasks from the recycle bin within 30 days.

title: Calendar Integration
description: Sync tasks with your calendar and set reminders.

title: Notifications
description: Get notified via email, push, and desktop notifications.

title: Progress Tracking
description: Track your task progress and stay on top of your goals.

title: Voice Commands
description: Manage your tasks using voice commands for hands-free control.

title: Dark Mode
description: Switch to dark mode to reduce eye strain and save battery.

title: Offline Mode
description: Access and manage your tasks even when you're offline.

title: Attachment Upload
description: Attach files and documents to your tasks for easy reference.

title: Location Reminders
description: Set location-based reminders for your tasks.

title: Sharing & Collaboration
description: Share and collaborate on tasks with your team.

title: Time Tracking
description: Track the time spent on each task and improve efficiency.

title: Export/Import
description: Export and import tasks in CSV and Excel formats.

title: In-App Chat
description: Chat with your team directly within the app.

title: Categories & Custom Categories
description: Organize tasks into categories and create custom categories.

title: Archive Tasks
description: Archive completed tasks for future reference.

title: Archive Tasks
description: Easily archive tasks you no longer need.
